Articles.Content:
this is my first publicly uploaded craft file:D 

the craft requires two mods which you can get off kerbalstuff

Mk2 cockpit expansion

[http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/644/Mk2%20cockpit%20expansion](http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/644/Mk2%20cockpit%20expansion)

tweak scale

[http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/344/TweakScale%20-%20Rescale%20Everything%21](http://www.kerbalstuff.com/mod/344/TweakScale%20-%20Rescale%20Everything%21)

heres some pictures of the craft no pics no clicks

![TmNR2KR.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TmNR2KR.jpg)

![TY47J2C.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TY47J2C.jpg)

![8wqEcwg.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8wqEcwg.jpg)

![T4j9lzf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/T4j9lzf.jpg)

![u618rYj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/u618rYj.jpg)

![uHOGFOa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uHOGFOa.jpg)

![CdjZJzu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CdjZJzu.jpg)

![alDOQI1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/alDOQI1.jpg)

this craft has an abort action group if you click the abort button the front of the craft will fly off and parachutes will deploy also if you pull up to hard the wings will fly off so thats way i put in the abort system ACTION GROUP 1 EXTENDS A LADDER AND ACTION GROUP 2 SHUTS DOWN JET ENGINES(3 on combat edition)(combat edition action group 2 fires all missiles

 and heres the link to the dropbox file of the craft enjoy!

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/0n68e8iumly0poe/F-14%20Kerbcat.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0n68e8iumly0poe/F-14%20Kerbcat.craft?dl=0)

version 2 download

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/zumih7q14xfejd3/F-14%20Kerbcat%20V2.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zumih7q14xfejd3/F-14%20Kerbcat%20V2.craft?dl=0)

combat edition download(I HIGHLY RECOMMEND INSTALLING BD ARMOURY TO PUT BETTER WEAPONS ON THE CRAFT I WILL BUT UP A BD ARMOURY EDITION WHEN I CAN)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/fve277uns41yzf5/F-14%20Kerbcat%20COMBAT%20EDITION.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fve277uns41yzf5/F-14%20Kerbcat%20COMBAT%20EDITION.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T09:31:57Z" title="07/07/2015 09:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by Kerbostar**
  
added more info

Wow, that's nicely done! Repped!

A quick tip, though, you can embed images to the forums by adding the [ i m g] and [/ i m g] tags (no spaces) between the links.

Here, I embedded some of them for you: ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![TmNR2KRl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TmNR2KRl.jpg)

![TY47J2Cl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TY47J2Cl.jpg)
